item.title: How to write the UnitTest with stdin at Pytest
item.description: If you want to write UnitTest when using stdin in Python. Pytest provide setattr function in monkeypatch from io import StringIO import sys def divide(): input = sys.stdin.readline return list(input()) def gather(): input = sys.stdin.readline return sum(list(map(int, input().split()))) def test_divide(monkeypatch): monkeypatch.setattr('sys.stdin', StringIO('abc')) assert divide() == ['a', 'b', 'c'] def test_gather(monkeypatch): monkeypatch.setattr('sys.stdin', StringIO('1 2 3')) assert gather() == 6 Reference Monkeypatching/mocking modules and environments I want to use stdin in a pytest test https://gist.
